name: Lyssa Project
description:
"Let us live, since we must die"

 Lyssa Project (or just Lyssa) Is a RPG developed by Vih. You will be playing as Alayss, a high school girl warped into the Soul World, a world full of demons and deceased spirits. Will she be able to find the person who kidnapped her while trying to regain the faith of her past late best "friend"? Or will she fall into despair?
